bwwExcerpt: Feed your soul: Go see The Band's Visit. Now that this exquisite musical has moved uptown to Broadway - it opened tonight at the Ethel Barrymore Theatre - I can make that recommendation with only one caveat, which is to spring for center orchestra seats, but more about that later. The rare film-to-musical adaptation that enhances the source material, The Band's Visit has stayed with me in the year since it opened off-Broadway at the Atlantic Theater Company, like a dream from which I never wante
